name: Anti-Racism and Justice for All
socialShareText: Your donation will be split evenly between these groups working tirelessly to fight racism and promote justice for all.
about: Your donation will be split evenly between these groups working tirelessly to fight racism and promote justice for all.

sponsor.description: Amplify your gift! Generous donors will match you dollar-for-dollar up to $100 each time until we reach $10,000 total matched.

nonprofits.name: NDN Collective
nonprofits.about: NDN Collective is an Indigenous-led organization dedicated to building Indigenous power.

nonprofits.name: African American Policy Forum
nonprofits.about: The intersectional think tank behind #SayHerName and #BlackGirlsMatter. Led by Kimberl√© Crenshaw.

nonprofits.name: Equal Justice Initiative
nonprofits.about: EJI is committed to ending mass incarceration in the US and challenging racial and economic injustice.

nonprofits.name: Black & Brown Founders
nonprofits.about: Giving Black & Latinx entrepreneurs knowledge, tools and tactics to launch startups without relying on venture capital.

nonprofits.name: Audre Lorde Project
nonprofits.about: Community organizing center for LGBTSTGNC People of Color.

nonprofits.name: Asian Americans Advancing Justice - AAJC
nonprofits.about: Advance civil and human rights for Asian Americans and to build and promote a fair and equitable society for all.

nonprofits.name: 540 WMain
nonprofits.about: A virtual non-profit organization & antiracist education brand that promotes justice for all.
